ChangeGroups.Name: 신규
Changes: 콘텐츠 페이지의 작업에 '모두 구독 취소' 버튼 추가.
BOB 구성에서 누락된 항목을 구독하는 유틸리티 섹션 추가.
기본적으로 필터 & 작업 섹션이 열리는 옵션 추가.
변경사항 페이지 추가. 도움말 섹션의 버튼을 사용하거나 새 버전일 때 볼 수 있습니다.

ChangeGroups.Name: 개선
Changes: 고장난 에셋에 대한 호환성 보고서 추가
미등록인 패키지도 이제 정상적인 이름과 썸네일을 가집니다.
이제 폴더 설정에 대한 자리표시자에 당신의 OS가 올바르게 반영됩니다.
제작자의 이름을 Ctrl+클릭하여 필터에 추가하기

ChangeGroups.Name: 수정
Changes: Fixed legacy profiles not being converted after the first launch.
Fixed local assets not automatically refreshing after external changes.
Fixed deleting local assets from the right-click menu deleting all local assets instead of just one
Fixed converting LOT 1 profiles resulting in assets being marked as 'Local'
Fixed 'Real' folders being swapped on save for Linux & Mac users.
Fixed Linux & Mac users not being able to generate a log zip.

ChangeGroups.Name: Added the Help & Logs section
Changes: Easily access your logs.
Quickly view errors in your most recent/current game session.
Simplify a log file to focus on what's actually happening.
Share a zip file containing all the logs needed for someone to help you out.

ChangeGroups.Name: Improvements
Changes: Changed the icons of filters to reflect the correct icons used in the list.

ChangeGroups.Name: Fixes
Changes: Fixed the text in the import collection for subscribing and unsubscribing being flipped.
Fixed the map selection for a new game not letting users select a vanilla map.

ChangeGroups.Name: Fixes
Changes: Fixed a bug that caused infinite loading for some users.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Removed the subscription tab from the in-game mod options.
Fixed DLCs not being applied when loading a profile.
Fixed the language option being empty for some people.
Re-downloading from steam will no longer force the focus back to the tool.
Other UI changes.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Adding an info popup when subscribing to items for the first time.
Added a warning text in the dashboard when you have multiple LOM instances installed.
Added small tags next to package titles.
Re-downloading Load Order Tool will initiate the download and close the app while it gets updated.
Fixed and improved the speed of Loading Screen Mod reports.

ChangeGroups.Name: Profile Changes
Changes: Changed the design of your profile list.
Favorite Profiles are now shown on your dashboard to allow easy switching between them.
Added the 'Other Profiles' section in a package's page to easily exclude or include them from your other profiles
Added new Profile sorting options. The selected sorting will now be remembered throughout sessions.
Added right-click actions in the content list to exclude or include an item in all your packages.
Added a button too view a Profile's file on your computer.
You can now assign a color to your profiles.
You can now create a desktop shortcut for your profiles.
You can now import a LOT 1 profile in the 'Add Profile' section.

ChangeGroups.Name: Improvements
Changes: Steam links will now open inside of Steam's window. This can be toggled off in the Options.
Local assets are now correctly groupped based on the folders they're in.
Your Paradox account panel will always be displayed from now on.
The window buttons on the top right now have icons to explain their actions.
Improved the responsiveness of the content list pages.
Search in the content list pages is now much faster.
Mod loading is now cached; resulting in more efficient loads on Windows & Linux, as well as much faster loads on macOS.
You can now generate a zip file of your logs while the game is running.

ChangeGroups.Name: Fixes
Changes: Fixed freezes happening in the content list pages.
Fixed Profiles' Auto-Save not working correctly.
Fixed not being able to use Workshop maps & save-games in the profile settings
Fixed custom maps not loading when selected in the profile settings.
Fixed loading Profiles on macOS & Linux not always applying correctly.
Having a custom location for LSMR report files will now correctly start from there when selecting a report file in the Utilities page.
